title: Crystal Therapy — Empress Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Crystals Crystals are considered earth energy in physical form. In Feng Shui, the ancient Chinese art of placement and spacial harmony, crystals are viewed as "cures' to enhance areas of the home or office that may need more balance to benefit the health, prosperity, energy flow and emotions of its inhabitants. A wide variety of unique, difficult to find and specialty crystals are available in an array of shapes, sizes and price ranges for the crystal collector, Feng Shui enthusiast or for use in crystal therapy. Crystals also make thoughtful, one of a kind gifts. Crystal therapy is a way to enhance your energy, improve mood, create more peace and alleviate stress by placement of crystals on a variety of acupuncture points, meridians and chakras. Crystal therapy can be done in tandem with acupuncture or energy work as well as on its own.
